official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the requirement that divorced wives' husbands must retire before divorced wives are eligible for annuity under the Act.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to repeal the requirement that divorced wives' husbands must retire before such wives are eligible for an annuity under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the requirement that divorced wives' husbands must retire before divorced wives are eligible for annuity under the Act.
